data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: I've observed meetings at this company for a long time. I ____ say ____ this ____ in ____ has ____ admirable ____ skills. Everyone ____ shows a real ____ to ____ to ____ another. I hope you maintain this, because it is a sign of a great working environment.

Everyone he__ shows a real commi_____ to list_____ to o__ another. I hope you maintain this, because it is a sign of a great working environment.
data.fullContent: I've observed meetings at this company for a long time. I can say that this team in particular has very admirable communication skills. Everyone here shows a real commitment to listening to one another. I hope you maintain this, because it is a sign of a great working environment.
data.answer: 我在这家公司观察会议已经很长时间了。我可以说，这个团队特别具有令人钦佩的沟通技巧。这里的每个人都表现出真正致力于倾听彼此。我希望你能坚持下去，因为这是良好工作环境的标志。
